content: *just in time for new years day 2018 my first free pattern this super simple ear warmer pattern works up extremely quickly great for a last minute gift or a mindless fast knit for the movie theater * **sizes ** child adult small adult large **yarn ** worsted 50 60 70 yards yarn shown in photos is malabrigo rios 1 in the cereza colorway **needles ** us7/4 5mm 16 circular **notions ** darning needle stitch marker **gauge ** 20 sts = 4 in stockinette 1 http //www malabrigoyarn com/rios-25# wkrm61q-c6u
